summary: The Faster Buses Better Futures Act (H.R. 5230) aims to improve and expand local bus service in the United States. Key provisions include grants for bus network redesign (focusing on increased ridership and equity), funding for accessible transit stops, mandates for transit priority measures on public rights-of-way, state purchasing options for bus stop equipment, and increased funding for Federal Transit Administration staffing and administrative expenses. The bill emphasizes reducing emissions and improving transit for underserved communities.
